[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1171567][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/worldnews-pray.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Terrorist Attacks Claim 50 Lives in New Zealand[/color][/b]
In what was the deadliest mass shooting in New Zealand's history, 50 people were killed and 50 more were injured in the Christchurch mosque shootings on March 15. The man charged for these attacks has been described as a white supremacist and part of the "alt-right". The shooting has sparked discussion about gun control and the growing violence of extremists around the world. Since the attacks, some have started to voluntarily turn in their weapons to the police as a symbol of solidarity. Following the discovery that the perpetrator's guns were legally acquired, the New Zealand government has been faced with mounting pressure for tighter gun control legislation. Another discussion that has ignited following the shootings is the question of whether or not videos of the shooting should be allowed on websites as an Australian internet provider blocked access to multiple websites where the video was hosted. Moreover, websites like Reddit have outright banned communities that were dedicated to sharing gory images and videos.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.cnn.com/asia/live-news/new-zealand-christchurch-shooting-intl/index.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Italy Bans Unvaccinated Children From School[/color][/b] 
After months of debate about compulsory vaccination, the Italian government has passed legislation requiring families to get 10 compulsory vaccinations in order for the children to attend school. Additionally, parents may be charged up for €500 if they send their unvaccinated children to school because they pose a risk to the other children. Like many other countries, such as the United States, Italy has seen a spike in anti-vaxxers and has recently had a measles outbreak. Additionally, Italy's vaccination rates have dropped below 80% - which is much lower than the World health Organization's 95% target. To combat this and increase the vaccination rates, the government has made vaccinations compulsory for diseases like chickenpox, polio and measles. This legislation has been implemented and repealed before following demonstrations in Rome, but the recent outbreaks in Italy and other parts of Europe has made the Italian government re-think its stance and re-implement the law. 
[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-47536981]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Over 1,000 Feared Dead After Cyclone Idai Devastates Southern Africa[/color][/b]
After making landfall with speeds over 100 mph, Cyclone Idai has devastated many cities and has killed an estimated 1,000 people in Mozambique. Miles of urban territory were underwater shortly after the cyclone had passed and whole villages were leveled. The scenes overhead looked like war zones as homes and infrastructure were completely destroyed by the powerful cyclone. One of the greatest losses and a good representation of the cyclone's power was the destruction of over 90% of Beira, a city of about 500,000 people. Several organizations and countries are now working together to provide logistical and humanitarian support to the countries affected. The majority of help provided thus far has been in delivering much needed resources, helping repair roads and homes as well as rescuing and tending to people in affected areas. 
[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.bbc.com/news/world-africa-47624156]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]    [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1992268][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/sportsnews-thornzzz.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=white][b]March Madness Begins Soon![/b][/color]
With the College Basketball season beginning to come to a close we begin to see the beginning of March Madness. March Madness will begin Thursday, March 21st with the opening match being Minnesota vs. Louisville at 12:00 PM CST US. These games will be held on CBS, TNT, truTV, and TBS. Duke comes into the tournament with the highest odds of winning it behind Gonzaga and North Carolina. This March Madness is expected to explode with popularity due to the Duke team's three stars who have declared for the 2019 NBA Draft: Zion Williamson, Cam Reddish and R.J Barett. This tournament is a must watch for all basketball fans.

[color=white][b]Tampa Bay Lightning Secure President's Trophy[/b][/color]
The Tampa Bay Lightning clinched the President's Trophy with their 56th win in 73 games. They are the second fastest team in NHL history to clinch the trophy behind only the 1995-1996 Detroit Red Wings who only needed 71 games to get the trophy. With currently 9 games remaining in the seasons the Lightning have a chance of finishing with 135 points on the season and 65 wins. Their current record is 56-13-4. They're looking to keep this success going into the playoffs and get their 2nd Stanley Cup in franchise history. 

[color=white][b]Blake Bortles Signs With The Los Angeles Rams[/b][/color]
The 26 year old former 3rd overall draft pick in 2014 is set to sign with the Los Angeles Rams. The quarterback was notorious for his chokes and his mishaps as he was the starter for the Jacksonville Jaguars who recently signed 2017 Super Bowl MVP Nick Foles to replace him as the starting quarterback on the Jaguars. During his 4 year tenure with the Jaguars Bortles lead the league in interceptions and was second in fumbles. Bortles hopes to add to a young LA Rams team that lost to the New England Patriots in the 2018 Super Bowl.

[color=transparent]      [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1992268][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/gamingnews-thornzzz.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=white][b]Call Of Duty Mobile Gets New Trailer[/b][/color]
Activision has officially announced their new mobile Call of Duty game by publishing the trailer publicly March 18th. The game is slated to be free to play and promises the players intense Call of Duty moments at their finger tips at all time. They also showed us that old popular maps such as Nuketown will be making a return in the mobile platform. You can currently sign up on the Call of Duty website to help beta test the game and qualify for in-game rewards. Towards the end of the trailer they even teased Battle Royale for this mobile game. 

[color=white][b]Esports Now Currently Recognized By 8 U.S States As A High School Sport[/b][/color]
As of the current time Connecticut, Georgia, Kentucky, Massachusetts, Rhode Island, Alabama, Mississippi, and Texas have all agreed to acknowledge Esports as an official school regulated sport. With Colleges, including my own now having Division 1 and Division 2 Esports teams high schools have begun following in suit. Making varsity and junior varsity teams for each school to compete with. There is also now Colleges that give scholarships for gaming. With more states joining the fray Esports is looking to become a stable within high school sports for awhile.

[color=white][b]Cloud9 CS:GO Parts Way With kioshima And Introduces Konfig and Jugi[/b][/color]
The American based Counter Strike team has announced that it is parting ways with the French born superstar, kioshima and bringing in Danish superstar Konfig and Danish AWPer Jugi from Optic. The 21 year old Krisitan 'Konfig' Wienecke was HLTV.org's #14 best player for the year 2017, but after having a very disappointing 2018 with his new team Optic, the Danish player is looking for new opportunities playing in North America with Cloud9. Also along with Konfig and Jugi's additions they announced that Swedish IGL Maikil 'Golden' Selim will be returning to the lineup after being out for 8 months with heart problems. The North American team will now change to an European team, losing their Major Legends title.

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3601559][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/animenews-nightmare.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Seven Seas Entertainment Licenses "Dance in the Vampire Bund: A.S.O." Manga[/color][/b]
Seven Seas Entertainment announced on Friday that they've licensed Nozomu Tamaki's "Dance in the Vampire Bund: A.S.O." manga. They will be releasing the first compiled book volume of the manga both physically and digitally on October 8th. "Dance in the Vampire Bund: A.S.O." is a sequal to Tamaki's "Dance in the Vampire Bund" manga, and a continuation of the story from "Dance in the Vampire Bund II: Scarlet Order". They've described the Manga as follows "Several years after the release of the final volume of Dance in the Vampire Bund II: Scarlet Order, the hit supernatural tale is back with an all-new series. Age of Scarlet Order, abbreviated as A.S.O., follows the continuing adventures of Mina Tepes, the revolutionary queen of the vampires. Along with her faithful werewolf bodyguard Akira, Mina will not rest until vampires and humans can coexist in peace--even when certain factions of the world want her dead. This series is an exciting new chapter of the supernatural action/drama manga that has been a staple in the Seven Seas line-up for a decade.". Dance in the Vampire Bund: A.S.O. launched in TO Books' web manga magazine Comic Corona in May of 20th, and the first compiled book was released on December 1st. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2019-03-15/seven-seas-entertainment-licenses-dance-in-the-vampire-bund-a.s.o-manga/.144609]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Crunchyroll and Adult Swim Announce Toonami Programming Partnership With Distribution Deal[/color][/b]
Crunchyroll and Adult Swim announced a new Programming Partnership and expanded distribution deal on Tuesday. Crunchyroll will now be a "Premiere content partner" for Adult Swim's Toonami, which airs on Saturday nights. The two companies will collaborate on licensed content, co-productions, and distribution opportunities. Crunchyroll general manager Joanne Waage noted that the companies "mission is to grow anime globally," and their Toonami deal will help further that goal as "Toonami has been incredibly influential in the growth of anime here in the U.S.".    [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2019-03-12/crunchyroll-adult-swim-announce-toonami-programming-partnership-with-distribution-deal/.144452]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]GONZO Produces Try Knights TV Anime for Summer Broadcast[/color][/b]
Television channel NTV opened a website on Thursday to announce that GONZO will be producing a television anime adaption of  the Try Knights Manga by Senzoku Erisawa and Shunsaku Yano. The manga's story centers on high school students "Akira Kariya and Riku Haruma. One day, the new rugby club member Akira gets advice on running from Riku, who used to be absorbed in rugby but gave it up because he lacked the physique for the sport. Akira takes an interest in Riku, and Riku's passion for rugby gradually returns. By joining forces, the pair can play a new tactical game and aim for the top of high school rugby.". The series originally launched with Erisawa's art and Yano's scenario in Monthly Comic Gene on June 15th. Kadokawa will release the first and second compiled book volumes on March 27th. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2019-03-14/gonzo-produces-try-knights-tv-anime-for-summer-broadcast/.144525]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2890436][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/trends-mimikyu.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]New Trailer for The Avengers: Endgame[/color][/b]
Greetings true believers! The new trailer for The Avengers: Endgame has been released. The new trailer doesn't show very much, but it does seem like the remaining Avengers have a plan, and it seems like Captain Marvel will be joining the party as well. They have to find a way to bring back the others and defeat Thanos once and for all. The film is set to be released in theaters on April 26, 2019. They even have a countdown to the film's release date on the official Marvel website.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.marvel.com/movies/avengers-endgame] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Shaq Tries to Not Make a Face While Eating Spicy Wings | Hot Ones[/color][/b]
A new "Hot Ones" video was released by the YouTube channel First We Feast. This time they got famous retired NBA basketball player Shaquille O'Neal to take on the Hot Ones challenge. They go on to interview Shaq and talk about his past and his history with basketball and the NBA while he eats the wings. Sixteen minutes in, he tries the "Garlic Reaper" wing, and he starts tearing up and freaking out. It just gets worse for him from here on out. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_sZH-psg9yE]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Tesla Model Y Revealed[/color][/b]
Elon Musk has revealed the all-new Tesla Model Y. It is a compact SUV that drives like a sports car. The new design doesn't look very much like your traditional SUV's, but it is an immaculate and nice looking model. The car looks like it will have an autopilot feature, allowing it to drive on its own to a given location. The price range of the primary long-range Model Y will be around $47,000, and later on, they will release a standard version for approximately $39,000. The SUV shows to have seven seats in the demonstration, but the seven seats are optional as Elon Musk mentions. The Tesla Model Y is said to be released in 2020, with the standard version to be released in 2021.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=knaskUXb12A] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]
